metadata.Title: CVE-2011-2185 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.Description:
Fabric before 1.1.0 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via asymlink attack on (1) a /tmp/fab.*.tar file or (2) certain other files inthe top level of /tmp/.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-2185` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fabric - 1.8.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fabric package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-1').
